scripts.security-scan:
echo '=== Running Trivy Security Scans ===' && echo '
[1/3] Scanning dependencies and configurations...' && trivy fs . --severity CRITICAL,HIGH --scanners vuln,misconfig --skip-dirs docs && echo '
[2/3] Scanning Dockerfile...' && trivy config Dockerfile --severity CRITICAL,HIGH && echo '
[3/3] Scanning Helm charts...' && trivy config helm/ --severity CRITICAL,HIGH && echo '
âœ“ Security scan complete!'
scripts.security-scan:image: echo 'Building and scanning Docker image...' && IMAGE_TAG=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) && docker build -t nextjs-frontend-template:$IMAGE_TAG . && trivy image nextjs-frontend-template:$IMAGE_TAG --severity CRITICAL,HIGH
